mapper.select: SELECT ii.id, ii."name", ii.type_enum, ii.range_code, ii.practitioner_id, ii.org_id, ii.group_json, ii.version_no FROM ( SELECT tog.id, tog."name", tog.type_enum, tog.range_code, tog.practitioner_id, tog.org_id, tog.group_json, tog.version_no, tog.tenant_id FROM tmp_order_group AS tog WHERE tog.delete_flag = '0') AS ii ${ew.customSqlSegment}
